onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: Please select your language:

Welcome to {prog_name}. Every parent everywhere needs support. We hope we can help. üíö

‚úÖ In {prog_name} you'll receive lessons to help you support your child through tough times.
Before we begin, {prog_name} is only for people 18 years and older. Are you 18 years or above?
onboarding_survey.choices.1.text: Yes, I am 18 years old or older
onboarding_survey.confirmation.question: Do you confirm that you are under the age of 18?
onboarding_survey.confirmation.back_option: No, take me back to the question
onboarding_survey.stop.conditions.1.message: Thank you for being honest üíõ {prog_name} is only for people 18+. Please talk to a trusted adult who can support you. If they‚Äôd like to join, they can type {joining_trigger}.  üå∏

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text:
üß° You are a great parent. Thank you for joining us. 

‚úÖ Participating in {prog_name} is optional.
‚úÖ We won‚Äôt ever ask for your name. Anything you share is safe, private, and anonymous.
‚ùåYou can stop when you want. Just type {STOP}

Before we start, we need to share some important information.

üìò Please read our Terms & Conditions here: {tnc_link}.

If you have read and accept the Terms & Conditions, please select YES.
If you do not accept, type "EXIT" to stop now.
onboarding_survey.confirmation.question: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please press NO. If you made a mistake, please press BACK and choose another option.
onboarding_survey.stop.conditions.1.message:
If you ever want to receive these tips in the future just type {joining_trigger}.
We hope to see you again soon.

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text:
Now a quick note about your privacy.
‚úÖ Your personal information is safe and private. 
‚úÖ Your name and information will not be public, but your responses will be used by researchers to learn how to support families like yours. 
‚úÖ The information you share may also be combined with other families‚Äô experiences so that we can understand how these programmes work across the world.
ü§ê If there are any questions that you feel uncomfortable answering, you do not have to answer them.

Please read this information carefully: {consent}

If you have read it and agree, please select YES.
If you do not want to participate, type "EXIT" to stop now.
onboarding_survey.confirmation.question: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please press NO. If you made a mistake, please press BACK and choose another option.
onboarding_survey.stop.conditions.1.message:
If you ever want to receive these tips in the future just type {joining_trigger}.
We hope to see you again soon.

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: Thank you! To complete this programme, you won‚Äôt be alone. You‚Äôll have a parenting guide by your side. There are two supportive parenting experts you can choose from:
Maria is a 45-year-old mother and experienced psychological support worker. Her calm voice and wise advice makes parents feel seen, heard, and supported.
Mykola is a 52-year-old dad and mental health counsellor. He helps parents manage stress and reconnect with their children using tools that helped him too.
Who would you like to be your guide?
‚ùîBefore we get started, we have a few questions to make this journey personalised:
How old are you?
Are you a WOMAN or MAN?
How many children do you take care of?
These tips are designed for those who look after children. Would you still like to receive the tips so you can share the advice with friends and family?
onboarding_survey.choices.2.text: I do not want the tips
onboarding_survey.stop.conditions.1.message:
If you ever want to receive these tips in the future just type {joining_trigger}.
We hope to see you again soon.

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: What is your current family situation?
onboarding_survey.choices.1.text: I am a parent with a partner
onboarding_survey.choices.3.text: I am a grandparent, relative, or other caregiver

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: What is your current living situation?
onboarding_survey.choices.2.text: Living at my permanent place of residence

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: Where are you located?

{prog_name} is easiest to use when you receive content with video guides. Videos are fun and engaging, but we understand if you have limited mobile data. To save on data, you can choose to receive the same content with an audio guide or just text. 

üì≤ How would you prefer to receive content ‚Äî with video guides, with audio guides, or just text?

Great! Thanks for letting us know your preference. üëå Before we continue, here‚Äôs something important about the illustrations you‚Äôll see in {prog_name}. They are AI adaptations of original work by Orli Setton created for Parenting for Lifelong Health, and shared under a CC BY-SA 4.0 International licence.

Thanks for answering our questions. We're ready to get started. üíö
To start, you can watch this video to learn about {prog_name}.

joining_messages.msg: Thanks for reaching out ü§ç It really shows how much you care about your children. Right now, the programme is full, but we‚Äôve added you to the waiting list. As soon as a spot opens up, we‚Äôll let you know.
